thought: To craft a yellow_bed, I need to craft acacia_planks. To craft acacia_planks, I need to place 1 stripped_acacia_log into the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the stripped_acacia_log from slot 43 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1
